title: Rakhi Sawant Left 'Heartbroken' As Dodi Khan Takes Back Marriage Proposal - Watch Video
text:
Trending:
Rakhi Sawant Left 'Heartbroken' As Dodi Khan Takes Back Marriage Proposal - Watch Video
On Thursday night, Dodi posted a video on his Instagram account where he clarified that despite his previous proposal, he is not going to marry Rakhi. In response to Dodi's video, Rakhi shared a teary-eyed emoji along with several broken-heart emojis in the comment section. Dodi opened up about the reason behind taking back his marriage proposal for Rakhi. Read on
Rakhi Sawant Left 'Heartbroken' As Dodi Khan Takes Back Marriage Proposal - Watch Video
Rakhi Sawant is visibly heartbroken and distressed after Pakistani actor and businessman Dodi Khan revealed that he will not marry her. On Thursday night, Dodi posted a video on his Instagram account where he clarified that despite his previous proposal, he is not going to marry Rakhi. In response to Dodi's video, Rakhi shared a teary-eyed emoji along with several broken-heart emojis in the comment section. Dodi opened up about the reason behind taking back his marriage proposal for Rakhi.
Why did Dodi take back the marriage proposal?
Dodi's video of taking back the marriage proposal sparked reactions from Rakhi's fans, many of whom questioned Dodi for causing her emotional pain. Khan has now broke his silence and shared the real reason behind taking back his marriage proposal while he also promises to find the perfect match for Rakhi in Pakistan.
In a recent interview with InstantBollywood, Dodi said, "Main abhi khud ek embarissing kind of situation mein hoon. Jo ki nahi honi chahiye. At one side main yeh bhi dekh raha hoon ki meri wajah se kisi ki achi sukoon ki life chal rahi hai, she is having fun in her life. Dubai mei woh reh rahi hai, Pakistan woh aa rahi hai, India jaa rahi hai, Saudi ja rahi hai, enjoy kar rahi hai. Aur phir achanak se ek banda aa kar unko propose karta hai."
When asked about Rakhi's reaction on his video, Dodi responds, "Dekhiye main Rakhi ke sath hamesha rahu ga, iss mei koi dorahe nahi hai, iss mei koi doubt nahi hai. Log bahaut hi ajeeb aur gareeb kisam ki baatein karte hai. Maine Rakhi se baat bhi ki, 'maine unn se kaha ki agar mere se naa bhi huee toh I will make sure ki aoka rishta Pakistan mei aisi jagah ho, ki apko pata chale, aur unn logo ko bhi pata chale jo apko pasand nahi bhi karte ki yaar, wakai isko kehte hai lifestyle
Dodi to NOT marry Rakhi Sawant
The video also sparked reactions from Rakhi's fans, many of whom questioned Dodi for causing her emotional pain. One fan commented, "Pehle Bina soche propose q Krna tha?" (Why propose without thinking?). Another fan expressed their sympathy, writing, "Awww that’s so sad, who cares about people, you and Rakhi should marry regardless of media and live a happy life, people will always criticize."
Also Read:
Rakhi Sawant Reveals Wedding Plans With Pak Actor Dodi Khan: Dad Always Wanted Me To Get Married To Police Man... | EXCLIn his video, Dodi Khan explained that although he had proposed to Rakhi, they would not be going forward with the wedding. He praised Rakhi for her strength and resilience, recounting the hardships she has faced in her life. Dodi also noted her conversion to Islam, her pilgrimage to Umrah, and her name change to Fatima, all of which made him admire her even more.
“Hello India and Pakistan, this is Dodi Khan. A few days ago, on social media, you saw a video of mine in which I had proposed to Rakhi Sawant. I proposed her because I know her very well. When I started knowing her, I felt she is a person who loves god a lot. She has seen a lot of ups and downs in her life, she lost her parents but was with them when they were ill. A guy came in her life, you all know what he did to her. She has come out of a lot of trauma. She accepted Islam, went for Umrah, and changed her name to Fatima. I liked that a lot that’s why I proposed to her," Dodi explained in Hindi.
He further stated, “But, I think that this is not acceptable to people because I have received a lot of messages and videos, and I cannot tolerate it. So, Rakhi ji, you are my very good friend, and will always be. You might not be able to be my bride, but I promise you that you will become the daughter-in-law of Pakistan. I will make you get married to one of my brothers."
Rakhi Sawant's personal life has been quite tumultuous. She was previously married to Adil Khan Durrani, but the couple separated in 2023. Before Adil, Rakhi was married to Ritesh Raj Singh. The two participated in Bigg Boss 15, but their relationship ended shortly after the show wrapped up in February 2022.
